statements: SELECT * FROM geothermal_data;
SELECT id, temperature, pressure FROM geothermal_data WHERE temperature > 200;
SELECT id, temperature, pressure, production_rate FROM geothermal_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, pressure, temperature FROM geothermal_data WHERE pressure < 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, production_rate FROM geothermal_data WHERE production_rate IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, pressure ASC;
SELECT id, temperature, pressure FROM geothermal_data WHERE temperature > 200 AND pressure < 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, temperature, pressure, production_rate FROM geothermal_data WHERE production_rate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY production_rate DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, pressure FROM geothermal_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 150 AND 250 AND pressure > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, pressure FROM geothermal_data WHERE temperature = 200 OR pressure = 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_reservoir_data;
SELECT temperature, pressure FROM geothermal_reservoir_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_reservoir_data ORDER BY production_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_reservoir_data WHERE temperature > 200;
SELECT id, temperature, pressure FROM geothermal_reservoir_data WHERE pressure < 500;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_reservoir_data WHERE temperature > 200 ORDER BY pressure DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT id, temperature, pressure FROM geothermal_reservoir_data WHERE production_rate < 1000 LIMIT 5
SELECT extraction_date, extracted_energy FROM energy_extraction WHERE reservoir_id = 3 ORDER BY extraction_date DESC
SELECT id, temperature, production_rate FROM geothermal_reservoir_data WHERE pressure BETWEEN 1000 AND 1500
SELECT * FROM geothermal_reservoir_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM temperature_data;
SELECT reservoir_id, temperature, timestamp FROM pressure_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT reservoir_id, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE reservoir_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM temperature_data;
SELECT reservoir_id, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT reservoir_id, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM pressure_data WHERE reservoir_id = 2 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT reservoir_id, production_rate FROM production_data WHERE production_rate > 100 ORDER BY reservoir_id ASC
SELECT temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_data WHERE reservoir_id = 3 AND timestamp > '2022-09-01'

SELECT reservoir_id, temperature, pressure, production_rate FROM temperature_data t INNER JOIN pressure_data p ON t.reservoir_id = p.reservoir_id INNER JOIN production_data pd ON t.reservoir_id = pd.reservoir_id;
SELECT * FROM temperature
SELECT temperature_value, timestamp FROM temperature ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT MAX(temperature_value) AS max_temperature FROM temperature

SELECT temperature_value, pressure_value, production_rate_value FROM temperature JOIN pressure ON temperature.timestamp = pressure.timestamp JOIN production_rate ON temperature.timestamp = production_rate.timestamp

SELECT reservoir_id, temperature.temperature_value, pressure.pressure_value, production_rate.production_rate_value FROM reservoir JOIN temperature ON reservoir.temperature_id = temperature.id JOIN pressure ON reservoir.pressure_id = pressure.id JOIN production_rate ON reservoir.production_rate_id = production_rate.id
SELECT temperature_value, timestamp FROM temperature WHERE temperature_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM pressure WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';

SELECT reservoir_id, temperature.temperature_value, pressure.pressure_value FROM reservoir LEFT JOIN temperature ON temperature.id = reservoir.temperature_id LEFT JOIN pressure ON pressure.id = reservoir.pressure_id;
SELECT MAX(production_rate_value) AS max_production_rate, MIN(production_rate_value) AS min_production_rate FROM production_rate;

SELECT reservoir_id, AVG(temperature.temperature_value) AS avg_temperature, AVG(pressure.pressure_value) AS avg_pressure FROM reservoir LEFT JOIN temperature ON temperature.id = reservoir.temperature_id LEFT JOIN pressure ON pressure.id = reservoir.pressure_id GROUP BY reservoir_id HAVING avg_temperature > 60 AND avg_pressure < 100;
SELECT * FROM reservoir_data
SELECT location, temperature FROM reservoir_data
SELECT id, pressure FROM pressure_data
SELECT location_id, production_rate FROM production_data ORDER BY production_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_extraction WHERE energy_efficiency > 0.8
SELECT id, location, temperature, pressure, production_rate FROM reservoir_data;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, pressure, production_rate FROM pressure_data WHERE location_id = 3 AND pressure < 300 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE location_id = 5 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT location, energy_extracted, energy_efficiency FROM energy_extraction WHERE energy_efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY energy_extracted DESC LIMIT 5;
